description: This is an introductory course in Hindi that presents the Devanagari script, elementary grammar and sentence structure.
This intermediate level course seeks to impart functional literacy in oral and written expression in Hindi to students.
This is an intermediate level course in Hindi that seeks to improve student's skills in oral and written expression.
other: Bachelor of Arts: Foreign/World Lang (12th Unit)

description: Hindi 110 teaches basic intermediate to advanced functional proficiency (ACTFL Standards) in reading, writing, and speaking Hindi.
